project.title: NIKE WOMEN
project.overview: In order to improve the user experience of existing Nike website, the overall menu and category classification has been simplified and pop-ups are actively used to reduce the frequency of page movement as much as possible.

project.title: ZARA
project.lang: HTML, CSS, SCSS, JavaScript, jQuery, JSON
project.overview: Zara has been selected to practice features that I have never used before and to try Zara's editorial design with a clear brand concept.

project.title: KOREA DESIGN
project.overview: I was not yet trained enough to get used to it, so whenever there was a gap between projects, I felt lost, and to overcome this, I found and practiced the design I wanted to create in a short time.

project.title: FOR#REST
project.lang: HTML, CSS, SCSS, JavaScript, jQuery, JSON
project.overview: As the domestic camping population increases, most of the services are concentrated on camping site reservations, and the number of users dissatisfied with the service is increasing. To this end, we have created a camping information sharing platform service that provides customized information and a better camping experience, and can solve various difficulties encountered in the process of collecting information related to camping. It is a compound word of FOREST and REST, meaning the coexistence of nature and rest.
